name: BFDL Prod Account Access Key Rotation.txt - Bajaj Finance S3 Bucket Access
description: This section explains how to securely store and access the AWS S3 bucket credentials (access key and secret key) for the Bajaj Finance account. The credentials need to be added to a secure credential store called 'credstash-prod-ufh' under the keys 'aws_s3_bajaj_access_key' and 'aws_s3_bajaj_secret' respectively. This allows secure access to the Bajaj Finance S3 bucket without exposing the credentials in plaintext.
use_cases: Accessing the Bajaj Finance S3 bucket
Securely storing and retrieving AWS credentials
Enabling secure data transfer to/from the Bajaj Finance S3 bucket
Implementing least privilege access to AWS resources

name: BFDL Prod Account Access Key Rotation.txt - Instructions for Bajaj
description: This section provides instructions for Bajaj, likely a company or team, on how to rotate their access keys for the BFDL Prod Account. It outlines a process where Bajaj should generate a new pair of access keys, send them to the devops.team@razorpay.com email address, wait 24 hours for the new keys to be added to Razorpay's secret manager, and then deactivate or remove the old keys only after receiving confirmation from Razorpay.
use_cases: Rotating access keys for security purposes
Updating access keys in a secure and controlled manner
Coordinating access key changes between different teams or organizations
